body.name: Car DVR Back Up Car Camera Rear View 2.5K Video WiFi 1440P Recorder 3" inch 1080P Dual Lens Cam Front and Rear Backup Reverse Security for Car
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: View and share your videos instantly on your smartphone via the mobile app. You can download videos directly to your phone and share your journey on any social media for your friends and family.

Record Ultra HD Video:Front camera 2.5K (2560*1440), Rear camera 720P (1280*720). Wide Angle front camera lens, capture all the action in crystal clear video. Video and audio are automatically recorded in an endless loop and saved in memory card. Record traffic incidents, scenic travel, unexpected moments or any social media worthy video.

Dual Cam Simultaneously Recording and Rear view camera support : This Car camera has two cameras that allows for simultaneously recording videos from two different angles. Picture in Picture display will let you have clear view from front and back-up camera.

It supports up to 256GB of micro SD memory cards and has a longer recording time than other products.Loop Recording Function: This function ensures continuous recording without missing a second,record automatically during vehicle ignition, switch off automatically with ignition off to get you free from the hands operation.A 32GB memory card is included.

Free rear camera extension cable:The rear camera connection cable is 19 feet (6 meters) long and it is suitable for rear camera mounting of car and SUV. If you want to install the rear camera on pickup or truck, please contact us for a free extension cable.
body.description: Image Processing Application WDR Technology（Wide Dynamic Range）.Video recording is clearer and brighter. Support micro SD memory card up to 256G (Contains a 32GB memory card)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Image Processing Application WDR Technology（Wide Dynamic Range）.Video recording is clearer and brighter. Support micro SD memory card up to 256G (Contains a 32GB memory card)

Automatically display reversing images When you shift to "R" gear, the screen will automatically switch to the rear camera image. The guide line for parking makes the reversing more easy, assuring your safety.

Connect to the mobile app via WiFi View and share your videos instantly on your smartphone via the mobile app. You can download videos directly to your phone and share your journey on any social media for your friends and family.

2.5K 6-layer glass Ultra HD front camera The front camera consists of a 6-layer glass Ultra HD lens. Make sure your car's camera displays Ultra high-definition images during the day and night. It can record 2.5K（2560*1440）video.

Waterproof HD rear camera 720P A waterproof HD rear camera, presents a clear image of vehicles and objects around you when driving. IP67 waterproof standard keeps your rear camera working well in rainy weather. The resolution of the rear camera is 720P (1280*720). The rear camera is connected to the front camera via a 19-foot cable.

Loop recording and Gravity sensor The Loop recording will automatically overwrite the earliest video segment when the memory storage space is full. When the built-in gravity sensor detects a collision, the current video of dash cam will be locked to ensure important footage keep protected from being overwritten. Free rear camera extension cable The original rear camera extension cable is 19 feet long. It can be installed well behind cars and SUVs. If you are a pickup or truck, you need a rear camera extension that can be extended to 33 feet. We have extension cables to provide. 1 x car camera 1 x Rear Camera(Cable length 19 feet) 1 x Car Charger (Cable length 10 feet) 1 x Suction cup holder 1 x 32GB memory card 1 x User Manual (English)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: WOW,This camera is great! I have owned and installed a few of these cameras in the past and this one is by far the easiest to install, and has the best access to the video content via the app on my iPhone, not necessary to remove the supplied 32 gig mini SD card, yes I said “supplied SD card”Usually these have to be purchased separately, and they offer you a free 64 gig card if you just Email them telling them that you like their productBack to the cameras great pictures/videos, easy installation, and great value @ $19.99I may purchase a few more for other family members.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this so far. It works and you need to follow the instructions to hook it up. It was not too hard. The video quality is good. I also like that it comes with its own SD card as my other dash cam did not. Also, it turns on and off automatically when you turn on your car. It adds piece of mind incase you do get into an accident that is not your fault.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars There’s no information for the app
reviews.reviewText: I look all over there no QR code to get the app no information for it am I suppose to just download anything I see?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, and clear video footage. I got this for my mom and step dad and it works great for the both of them 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, no excuse not to buy if you drive
reviews.reviewText: For what this cost, a few gallons of gas, it could save you thousands for someone's mistake. Or a ticket if a cop is wrong. This is almost a required accessory today.The quality is more than sufficient. At night, the display looks clearer than looking thru the windshield. Videos are saved in 3 minute intervals. Comes with a manual explaining all the features, and a REAR camera for this price, which is almost unbelievable. It can work as a backup camera too. Picture quality among even expensive cameras is similar, but they may offer more features that may or may not be useful.I would suggest a "durable" SD card (inexpensive) and a hardwired kit (optional). The vendor has an email and they send you a 64GB card if you contact them, but to be safe there are "Ultra" SDs made for dashcams (this would be true for any brand). Probably good to change once a year.The app can also do real time recording, so if really want peace of mind you can use that feature.Requires a "trapezoid" shape mini-USB connector for power, comes with an adapter. Only Con would be the adapter that needs a round 12V port, but there are other options for this. I could not imagine being without it for what it cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works and everything is included - Front and Rear dashcam
reviews.reviewText: Front and Rear dashcamOverall this is an inexpensive but functional dashcam with rear camera. It has average picture quality but is good enough to see what's going on. It will definitely be able to prove the accident wasn't your fault.Installation is easy with the included suction mount. I prefer something more permanent that has no chance of coming loose or falling down in a critical situation. I also purchased a hardwire kit to hide the power cable and connect it directly to the fusebox.Everything needed to get it working is included, along with the memory card. How well rated this micro SD card is for high and low temps a vehicle interior can experience are unknown, but typically most dashcam manufacturers recommend a high-grade card. The included one doesn't seem to have any of the ratings to indicate it's more than just a bog standard version.It claims to have a force sensor to secure the video in an accident so it isn't erased by mistake. A great feature if it works.Dashcams are like insurance, nice to have but hopefully never needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It gets the job done but it is Cheap cheap cheap.
reviews.reviewText: It's a dash cam. It is very basic. The image quality is NOT 2.5k. It may have the dimensions but the quality is NOT there. It mounts easily enough and has a long power cable. I was not able to use the rear facing camera as the cable was not long enough - but that was an issue with my vehicle being too large (van).If you need a cheap camera to get you a dash cam, this is it. But don't expect high quality videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture. Super easy to install and get working.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this camera. It was super easy to get going. It was pretty much ready to go out of the box. The cords provided for both the front and rear camera are long and reached where I needed them too just fine. The memory card included was ready to go without formatting, although I still did. The suction mount is easy to use and stays in place well. The rear camera is a little bit more difficult to install, but it does come with adhesive pad and screws. The picture on the camera is great. It is better than the other dash cam I have. Super clear and crisp. The camera powers on when I turn the car on and records automatically. I would recommend this camera dn rate t at 5 stars.
